cgcloud__Inventory_Control_Template__c.name: cgcloud__Inventory_Control_Template__c
cgcloud__Inventory_Control_Template__c.description: Stores the details of the inventory control template that's to be used for inventories.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

RecordTypeId.description: Represents the record type of the record.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Specifies whether the template is active.

cgcloud__Customer_Policy__c.description: Defines whether inventories based on this template are associated to a customer.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Inventory_Control_Measure__c.description: Unit of measure that's defined for the inventory control.

cgcloud__Period_Policy__c.description: Indicates whether a period assignment for the inventory control is required.

cgcloud__Period_Type__c.description: Applicable period for the inventory control record.

cgcloud__Product_Policy__c.description: Defines whether inventories based on this template are associated to a product.

cgcloud__Quota_Type__c.description: Applicable quota type for the inventory control.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Defines the Sales Organization in which the template can be used.

cgcloud__Tour_Policy__c.description: Defines whether inventories based on this template are associated to a tour.

cgcloud__Use_Description__c.description: Controls whether the language dependent description can be filled. If the description isn't allowed, the system doesn't create a text record for the inventory transaction.

cgcloud__User_Policy__c.description: Defines whether inventories based on this template are associated to a user.

cgcloud__Vehicle_Policy__c.description: Defines whether inventories based on this template are associated to a vehicle.
